name: The Woodwind Trees
tagline: Drifting melodies harmonise with the placid babbling of the River Shiver.
description: This section of the wood is dominated by trees with vibrant leaves ranging from bright pink to a reddish-violet. Their trunks and branches are honeycombed with small 1″ holes. When the wind blows through the holes, they create sonorous melodies. Animals flock to the trees, each singing along in their own way. Songbirds twitter in their branches, crickets chirp, frogs croak, and even flies buzz in tune.

points_of_interest.name: Woodwind Trees
points_of_interest.description: Trees with vibrant leaves ranging from bright pink to a reddish-violet. Their trunks and branches are honeycombed with small 1″ holes that create sonorous melodies when wind blows through them.
points_of_interest.interior: Animals flock to the trees, each singing along in their own way. The incessant music makes it impossible for parties to rest here. The music also disrupts magical incantations: spells have a 3-in-6 chance of failing when cast.
points_of_interest.inhabitants: Protected by woodgrues who dwell in the Treehouse.
special_features: Music disrupts rest - impossible to rest here
Spells have 3-in-6 chance of failing when cast
Wood is magical and can be made into Magical Instruments
If trees are harmed, song stops and 2d4 woodgrues arrive in 1d4 Turns

points_of_interest.name: Treehouse
points_of_interest.description: The largest woodwind tree lies at the centre of the hex. 5′ wicker spheres hang down from its branches like giant fruits, each connected by a lattice of rickety rope bridges.
points_of_interest.interior: Each wicker sphere is the dwelling of several woodgrues, furnished with a nest of furs and leaves. A central platform 20′ wide is built into the boughs of the tree, covered by a roof of violet leaves and illuminated by jars of twinkling fireflies. At night the woodgrues come here to play their songs.
points_of_interest.inhabitants: A band of 20 woodgrues, led by Threeble Pidderpat.

roll_tables.name: Magical Instruments
roll_tables.description: Random magical instrument from Threeble's workshop

special_features: Threeble's woodwind workshop - wicker cone above common area
Sells Magical Instruments for 200gp each to those who prove musical talent

npcs.name: Threeble Pidderpat
npcs.title: Level 4 Bard
npcs.description: A woodgrue woman with wiry white fur, sleepy eyes, and pale yellow ears. Wears a striped sock hat and an oversized shirt with long puffy sleeves she keeps rolled up. She is devoted to the trees that support her callings as a musician and instrument-crafter. She believes the trees speak to her through their songs.
demeanor: but quickly angered if the trees are threatened
npcs.speech: Sing-song, peppered with flowery words she doesn't actually understand. Often waxes poetic about nature's beauty.
desires: To discover the best song in the world
to create the best instrument in the world
